parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexplained cracking of the windshield can impair visibility, compromise the structural integrity of the vehicle, and affect the performance of advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) like EyeSight, potentially leading to accidents or safety risks.
symptoms: Windshield cracks suddenly appear without any apparent cause or visual impact
often starting from the bottom or middle of the windshield and spreading rapidly; cracks may occur while the vehicle is parked
or in motion; some cracks may be accompanied by a loud noise or "ping" sound.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning visor can obstruct the driver's view, causing a safety risk, especially during driving.
symptoms: The visor does not stay in place
or blocks partial view of the road.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden and unexplained windshield cracking and shattering can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities due to impaired visibility and sudden loss of control.
symptoms: Windshield cracks or shatters without any apparent reason
often starting from the bottom or sides of the windshield
and can occur while driving or when the vehicle is parked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the Thermo Control Valve can cause the engine to overheat, leading to engine damage, and disable safety features such as Eyesight, lane assist, and cruise control, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: and oil temperature light remains on. Engine codes P26A6 and P26A5 may be displayed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the Auto Stop-Start system can cause the engine to stall, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities, especially in heavy traffic or when driving uphill.
symptoms: Engine stalls or fails to restart
often accompanied by a screeching sound
and can occur when the vehicle is stopped at a traffic light or stop sign.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Battery drain can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities, especially in heavy traffic or when driving uphill.
symptoms: and can occur even when the vehicle is turned off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the auto start/stop feature can cause the vehicle to shut off unexpectedly, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle shuts off at a traffic light or in traffic
unable to move the shifter or use hazards.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Eyesight system can cause the loss of critical safety features, such as lane departure warning and forward emergency braking, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The Eyesight system flashes an error message
all functions controlled by Eyesight are disabled

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Battery Drain and Electrical System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the battery to drain quickly, leading to unexpected shutdowns and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: the CD player spins up and down.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the thermo control valve can cause the engine to overheat, leading to engine damage and increasing the risk of accidents.
The malfunction of the sunroof can cause distractions while driving, increasing the risk of accidents.
The failure of the automatic rear lift gate can cause difficulties in emergency situations.
symptoms: the lift gate can only be opened partially
the strut has seized or a sensor has triggered a brake.
